# PRISMA Checklist Web App


## Acknowledgements

This app was adapted from that used by the Transparency Checklist. The repo for that app can be found [here](https://github.com/BalazsAczel/TransparencyChecklist), and a citation for the Transparency Checklist tool is presented below:

> Aczel, B., Szaszi, B., Sarafoglou, A. Kekecs, Z., Kucharský, Š., Benjamin, D., ... & Wagenmakers, E.-J. (2019). A consensus-based transparency checklist. Nature Human Behavior, 1--3. doi:10.1038/s41562-019-0772-6
